title: I can't use my emotes :(
body:
I get an error message there is an error selecting them and then my emote triangle is greyed out and empty :(

https://i.imgur.com/kCdMZQv.png

replies.body: What kind of error message were you seeing? It's hard to know whether this was an issue with the emote system itself or some Windows error or possibly the client having problems without a little more info. Did you happen to have a screenshot of what's going wrong?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jP3E5dqq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-16T01:47:39.744+0000)
>
> What kind of error message were you seeing? It's hard to know whether this was an issue with the emote system itself or some Windows error or possibly the client having problems without a little more info. Did you happen to have a screenshot of what's going wrong?

Here it is:
https://i.imgur.com/kCdMZQv.png[/img]

I did a bit of digging and it looks like this specific error message is somehow related to your client not being able to pull the data on what emotes you have purchased from our servers. If you could, try running a quick traceroute to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). Post those results here so I can take a look.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jP3E5dqq,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-16T02:28:49.781+0000)
>
> I did a bit of digging and it looks like this specific error message is somehow related to your client not being able to pull the data on what emotes you have purchased from our servers. If you could, try running a quick traceroute to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). Post those results here so I can take a look.

I restarted my client and it works now lol
